verses.verse: And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass on <S%G1722><s%> the second <S%G1207><s%> sabbath <S%G4521><s%> after <S%G1207><s%> the first, <S%G1207><s%> that he went <S%G1279><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the corn <S%G4702><s%> fields; and his disciples <S%G3101><s%> plucked <S%G5089><s%> the ears <S%G4719><s%> of corn, <S%G4719><s%> and did eat, <S%G2068><s%> rubbing <S%G5597><s%> them in their hands. <S%G5495><s%>

And certain <S%G5100><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Why <S%G5101><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> you that which <S%G3739><s%> is not lawful <S%G1832><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> days?

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answering <S%G611><s%> them said, <S%G2036><s%> Have you not read <S%G314><s%> so <S%G3761><s%> much <S%G3761><s%> as this, <S%G5124><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> did, <S%G4160><s%> when <S%G3698><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> was an hungered, <S%G3983><s%> and they which <S%G3739><s%> were with him;

How <S%G5613><s%> he went <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and did take <S%G2983><s%> and eat <S%G5315><s%> the show bread, <S%G740><s%> <S%G4286><s%> and gave <S%G1325><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to them that were with him; which it is not lawful <S%G1832><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> but for the priests <S%G2409><s%> alone? <S%G3441><s%>
And he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, That the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> is Lord <S%G2962><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> of the sabbath. <S%G4521><s%>

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass also <S%G2532><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> sabbath, <S%G4521><s%> that he entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the synagogue <S%G4864><s%> and taught: <S%G1321><s%> and there <S%G1563><s%> was a man <S%G444><s%> whose <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846><s%> right <S%G1188><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> was withered. <S%G3584><s%>

And the scribes <S%G1122><s%> and Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> watched <S%G3906><s%> him, whether <S%G1487><s%> he would heal <S%G2323><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day; that they might find <S%G2147><s%> an accusation <S%G2724><s%> against him.

But he knew <S%G1492><s%> their thoughts, <S%G1261><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to the man <S%G444><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> the withered <S%G3584><s%> hand, <S%G5495><s%> Rise <S%G1453><s%> up, and stand <S%G2476><s%> forth in the middle. <S%G3319><s%> And he arose <S%G450><s%> and stood <S%G2476><s%> forth.

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to them, I will ask <S%G1905><s%> you one <S%G5100><s%> thing; Is it lawful <S%G1832><s%> on the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> days to do <S%G15><s%> good, <S%G15><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> to do <S%G2554><s%> evil? <S%G2554><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> life, <S%G5590><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> to destroy <S%G622><s%> it?

And looking <S%G4017><s%> round about <S%G4017><s%> on them all, <S%G3956><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> to the man, <S%G444><s%> Stretch <S%G1614><s%> forth <S%G1614><s%> your hand. <S%G5495><s%> And he did <S%G4160><s%> so: <S%G3779><s%> and his hand <S%G5495><s%> was restored <S%G600><s%> whole <S%G5199><s%> as the other. <S%G243><s%>

And they were filled <S%G4130><s%> with madness; <S%G454><s%> and communed <S%G1255><s%> one <S%G240><s%> with another <S%G240><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> they might do <S%G4160><s%> to Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass in those <S%G5025><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> that he went <S%G1831><s%> out into <S%G1519><s%> a mountain <S%G3735><s%> to pray, <S%G4336><s%> and continued <S%G1273><s%> all <S%G1273><s%> night <S%G1273><s%> in prayer <S%G4335><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>

And when <S%G3753><s%> it was day, <S%G2250><s%> he called <S%G4377><s%> to him his disciples: <S%G3101><s%> and of them he chose <S%G1586><s%> twelve, <S%G1427><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> he named <S%G3687><s%> apostles; <S%G652><s%>

Simon, <S%G4613><s%> (whom <S%G3739><s%> he also <S%G2532><s%> named <S%G3687><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%>) and Andrew <S%G406><s%> his brother, <S%G80><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> and John, <S%G2491><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> and Bartholomew, <S%G918><s%>
Matthew <S%G3156><s%> and Thomas, <S%G2381><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> the son of Alphaeus, <S%G256><s%> and Simon <S%G4613><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> Zelotes, <S%G2208><s%>
And Judas <S%G2455><s%> the brother of James, <S%G2385><s%> and Judas <S%G2455><s%> Iscariot, <S%G2469><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> was the traitor. <S%G4273><s%>

And he came <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> with them, and stood <S%G2476><s%> in the plain, <S%G5117><s%> <S%G3977><s%> and the company <S%G3793><s%> of his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G4128><s%> of people <S%G2992><s%> out of all <S%G3956><s%> Judaea <S%G2449><s%> and Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> and from the sea <S%G3882><s%> coast <S%G3882><s%> of Tyre <S%G5184><s%> and Sidon, <S%G4605><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to hear <S%G191><s%> him, and to be healed <S%G2390><s%> of their diseases; <S%G3554><s%>
And they that were vexed <S%G3791><s%> with unclean <S%G169><s%> spirits: <S%G4151><s%> and they were healed. <S%G2323><s%>

And the whole <S%G3956><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> to touch <S%G680><s%> him: for there went <S%G1831><s%> virtue <S%G1411><s%> out of him, and healed <S%G2390><s%> them all. <S%G3956><s%>

And he lifted <S%G1869><s%> up his eyes <S%G3788><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> be you poor: <S%G4434><s%> for yours <S%G5212><s%> is the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> are you that hunger <S%G3983><s%> now: <S%G3568><s%> for you shall be filled. <S%G5526><s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> are you that weep <S%G2799><s%> now: <S%G3568><s%> for you shall laugh. <S%G1070><s%>

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> are you, when <S%G3752><s%> men <S%G444><s%> shall hate <S%G3404><s%> you, and when <S%G3752><s%> they shall separate <S%G873><s%> you from their company, and shall reproach <S%G3679><s%> you, and cast <S%G1544><s%> out your <S%G5216><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> as evil, <S%G4190><s%> for the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man's <S%G444><s%> sake. <S%G1752><s%>

Rejoice <S%G5463><s%> you in that day, <S%G2250><s%> and leap <S%G4640><s%> for joy: for, behold, <S%G2400><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> reward <S%G3408><s%> is great <S%G4183><s%> in heaven: <S%G3772><s%> for in the like <S%G5024><s%> manner did <S%G4160><s%> their fathers <S%G3962><s%> to the prophets. <S%G4396><s%>
But woe <S%G3759><s%> to you that are rich! <S%G4145><s%> for you have received <S%G568><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> consolation. <S%G3874><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you that are full! <S%G1705><s%> for you shall hunger. <S%G3983><s%> Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you that laugh <S%G1070><s%> now! <S%G3568><s%> for you shall mourn <S%G3996><s%> and weep. <S%G2799><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, when <S%G3752><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G444><s%> shall speak <S%G2036><s%> well <S%G2573><s%> of you! for so <S%G2596><s%> <S%G5623><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> their fathers <S%G3962><s%> to the false <S%G5578><s%> prophets. <S%G5573><s%>

But I say <S%G3004><s%> to you which hear, <S%G191><s%> Love <S%G25><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> enemies, <S%G2190><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> good <S%G2573><s%> to them which <S%G3588><s%> hate <S%G3404><s%> you,
Bless <S%G2127><s%> them that curse <S%G2672><s%> you, and pray <S%G4336><s%> for them which spitefully <S%G1908><s%> use <S%G1908><s%> you.

And to him that smites <S%G5180><s%> you on <S%G1909><s%> the one cheek <S%G4600><s%> offer <S%G3930><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the other; <S%G243><s%> and him that takes <S%G142><s%> away <S%G142><s%> your cloak <S%G2440><s%> forbid <S%G2967><s%> not to take your coat <S%G5509><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

Give <S%G1325><s%> to every <S%G3956><s%> man that asks <S%G154><s%> of you; and of him that takes <S%G142><s%> away <S%G142><s%> your goods <S%G4674><s%> ask <S%G523><s%> them not again. <S%G523><s%>
And as you would <S%G2309><s%> that men <S%G444><s%> should do <S%G4160><s%> to you, do <S%G4160><s%> you also <S%G2532><s%> to them likewise. <S%G3668><s%>

For if <S%G1487><s%> you love <S%G25><s%> them which love <S%G25><s%> you, what <S%G4169><s%> thank <S%G5485><s%> have <S%G2076><s%> you? for sinners <S%G268><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> love <S%G25><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> that love <S%G25><s%> them.

And if <S%G1437><s%> you do good <S%G15><s%> to them which do <S%G15><s%> good <S%G15><s%> to you, what <S%G4169><s%> thank <S%G5485><s%> have <S%G2076><s%> you? for sinners <S%G268><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the same. <S%G846><s%>

And if <S%G1437><s%> you lend <S%G1155><s%> to them of whom <S%G3739><s%> you hope <S%G1679><s%> to receive, <S%G618><s%> what <S%G4169><s%> thank <S%G5485><s%> have <S%G2076><s%> you? for sinners <S%G268><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> lend <S%G1155><s%> to sinners, <S%G268><s%> to receive <S%G618><s%> as much <S%G2470><s%> again. <S%G618><s%>

But love <S%G25><s%> you your <S%G5216><s%> enemies, <S%G2190><s%> and do <S%G15><s%> good, <S%G15><s%> and lend, <S%G1155><s%> hoping <S%G560><s%> for nothing <S%G3367><s%> again; <S%G560><s%> and your <S%G5216><s%> reward <S%G3408><s%> shall be great, <S%G4183><s%> and you shall be the children <S%G5207><s%> of the Highest: <S%G5310><s%> for he is kind <S%G5543><s%> to the unthankful <S%G884><s%> and to the evil. <S%G4190><s%>
Be you therefore <S%G3767><s%> merciful, <S%G3629><s%> as your <S%G5216><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> is merciful. <S%G3629><s%>

Judge <S%G2919><s%> not, and you shall not be judged: <S%G2919><s%> condemn <S%G2613><s%> not, and you shall not be condemned: <S%G2613><s%> forgive, <S%G630><s%> and you shall be forgiven: <S%G630><s%>

Give, <S%G1325><s%> and it shall be given <S%G1325><s%> to you; good <S%G2570><s%> measure, <S%G3358><s%> pressed <S%G4085><s%> down, and shaken <S%G4531><s%> together, and running <S%G5240><s%> over, <S%G5240><s%> shall men give <S%G1325><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> bosom. <S%G2859><s%> For with the same <S%G846><s%> measure <S%G3358><s%> that you mete <S%G3354><s%> with it shall be measured <S%G488><s%> to you again. <S%G488><s%>

And he spoke <S%G2036><s%> a parable <S%G3850><s%> to them, Can <S%G1410><s%> the blind <S%G5185><s%> lead <S%G3594><s%> the blind? <S%G5185><s%> shall they not both <S%G297><s%> fall <S%G4098><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the ditch? <S%G999><s%>
The disciple <S%G3101><s%> is not above <S%G5228><s%> his master: <S%G1320><s%> but every <S%G3956><s%> one that is perfect <S%G2675><s%> shall be as his master. <S%G1320><s%>

And why <S%G5101><s%> behold <S%G991><s%> you the mote <S%G2595><s%> that is in your brother's <S%G80><s%> eye, <S%G3788><s%> but perceive <S%G2657><s%> not the beam <S%G1385><s%> that is in your <S%G2398><s%> own <S%G2398><s%> eye? <S%G3788><s%>

Either <S%G2228><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> you say <S%G3004><s%> to your brother, <S%G80><s%> Brother, <S%G80><s%> let <S%G863><s%> me pull <S%G1544><s%> out the mote <S%G2595><s%> that is in your <S%G4675><s%> eye, <S%G3788><s%> when you yourself <S%G846><s%> behold <S%G991><s%> not the beam <S%G1385><s%> that is in your <S%G4675><s%> own eye? <S%G3788><s%> You hypocrite, <S%G5273><s%> cast <S%G1544><s%> out first <S%G4412><s%> the beam <S%G1385><s%> out of your <S%G4675><s%> own eye, <S%G3788><s%> and then <S%G5119><s%> shall you see <S%G1227><s%> clearly <S%G1227><s%> to pull <S%G1544><s%> out the mote <S%G2595><s%> that is in your brother's <S%G80><s%> eye. <S%G3788><s%>

For a good <S%G2570><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%> brings <S%G4160><s%> not forth <S%G4160><s%> corrupt <S%G4550><s%> fruit; <S%G2590><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> does a corrupt <S%G4550><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%> bring <S%G4160><s%> forth <S%G4160><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> fruit. <S%G2590><s%>

For every <S%G1538><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%> is known <S%G1097><s%> by his own <S%G2398><s%> fruit. <S%G2590><s%> For of thorns <S%G173><s%> men do not gather <S%G4816><s%> figs, <S%G4810><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> of a bramble <S%G942><s%> bush <S%G942><s%> gather <S%G5166><s%> they grapes. <S%G4718><s%>

A good <S%G18><s%> man <S%G444><s%> out of the good <S%G18><s%> treasure <S%G2344><s%> of his heart <S%G2588><s%> brings <S%G4393><s%> forth <S%G4393><s%> that which is good; <S%G18><s%> and an evil <S%G4190><s%> man <S%G444><s%> out of the evil <S%G4190><s%> treasure <S%G2344><s%> of his heart <S%G2588><s%> brings <S%G4393><s%> forth <S%G4393><s%> that which is evil: <S%G4190><s%> for of the abundance <S%G4051><s%> of the heart <S%G2588><s%> his mouth <S%G4750><s%> speaks. <S%G2980><s%>
And why <S%G5101><s%> call <S%G2564><s%> you me, Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and do <S%G4160><s%> not the things which <S%G3739><s%> I say? <S%G3004><s%>

Whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> to me, and hears <S%G191><s%> my sayings, <S%G3056><s%> and does <S%G4160><s%> them, I will show <S%G5263><s%> you to whom <S%G5101><s%> he is like: <S%G3664><s%>

He is like <S%G3664><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> built <S%G3618><s%> an house, <S%G3614><s%> and dig <S%G4626><s%> deep, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G900><s%> and laid <S%G5087><s%> the foundation <S%G2310><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> a rock: <S%G4073><s%> and when the flood <S%G4132><s%> arose, <S%G1096><s%> the stream <S%G4215><s%> beat <S%G4366><s%> vehemently <S%G4366><s%> on that house, <S%G3614><s%> and could <S%G2480><s%> not shake <S%G4531><s%> it: for it was founded <S%G2311><s%> on a rock. <S%G4073><s%>

But he that hears, <S%G191><s%> and does <S%G4160><s%> not, is like <S%G3664><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> that without <S%G5565><s%> a foundation <S%G2310><s%> built <S%G3618><s%> an house <S%G3614><s%> on the earth; <S%G1093><s%> against <S%G4366><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the stream <S%G4215><s%> did beat <S%G4366><s%> vehemently, <S%G4366><s%> and immediately <S%G2112><s%> it fell; <S%G4098><s%> and the ruin <S%G4485><s%> of that house <S%G3614><s%> was great. <S%G3173><s%>
